Game has it's problems, won't deny it.
But overall it's fun and engaging, even more so with friends.

when you start playing the game, you might think it's pretty fun. it may actually be fun as shit to you. so you play it and play it and pour money and hours into it, and then you realize that devs give 0 sh1ts about the community and the actual game and are lying to the community making them think they're awesome, cool and good devs. anybody with some serious experience with this game can tell you it's sh1t and the devs don't give a fcck about it
That's why there are mainly positive reviews, to realize the game is dogsh1t you have to play it a lot

akÅŸam 8:30 dan sonra survivor sÄ±ralarÄ± Ã§ok uzun(7-8 dakika civarÄ±) ayrÄ±ca arkadaÅŸlarÄ±mla aynÄ± lobiye giremiyoruz oyun bizi aynÄ± oyuna sokmuyor ve menÃ¼lerde rastgele hata uyarÄ±sÄ± veriyor.
why is this ban irritating i sent a crash report during  game i have never left a gameplzzzz help with this thing you are giving ban because my gamecrashed  what the plzzzz help

Honestly the game is great but it is more of a game in favor of the killers with all of the perks that they do have. It makes it hard for the survivors to actually win to the point where it is kind of off putting to those who start the game and are level ones and then are faced with these killers that are so overpowered that there's no chance of winning at all. I think this is a great game but I don't think the killers need to start off as powerful as they are or they can't keep getting more and more powerful because otherwise it is just a game where the killer always wins and that's no fun for the four survivors. The survivors have perks as well but they don't help them as much as the killers perks do. Just makes me wonder is this game for the survivors or the killers? I do still recommend this game as it is a great game I play it all the time with my friends I just think that is how it could be better. I think playing with friends is a great way to play this game especially because you can talk where you are when the killer cannot hear you
honestly this game sucks, devs please fix this shit, but also, great game, I'd recommend 10/10
